name: User Prompts (Realistic)
description: 20 realistic user prompts with varying detail levels, technical specs, and imperfections

prompts.prompt: A woman in her 30s sitting at a cafe, looking out the window pensively, golden hour lighting, shot on 35mm film with shallow depth of field, f/1.8, bokeh in background, melancholic mood
man walking down street at night

Cinematic establishing shot: sprawling cyberpunk city at night, flying cars between neon-lit skyscrapers, rain falling, reflections everywhere, blade runner vibes, ultra wide angle 14mm, high contrast, moody color grade
close up on hands holding a coffee cup, steam rising, warm morning light comming through window
Medium shot, eye level, a tired nurse leaning against hospital hallway wall, fluorescent lighting, end of shift, emotional exhaustion visible, rule of thirds composition
kid playing with dog in backyard

Two shot conversation scene - business meeting, dark wood conference room, harsh overhead lighting creating shadows, tension in body language, one person standing one sitting, power dynamic, shot from corner of room looking in
POV shot from inside car looking out windshield, heavy rain, wipers going, blurry lights, night time drive
old man on bench feeding pigeons
Low angle hero shot: athlete at finish line arms raised in victory, sun behind them creating silhouette, crowd blurred in bg, dramatic moment, 85mm lens, f/2.8, fast shutter to freeze motion
Wide establishing shot of old farmhouse in wheat field during sunset, long shadows, golden light, peaceful countryside vibes, maybe some clouds in the sky, nostalgic feeling
girl reading book
Over the shoulder shot of someone working on laptop late at night, face illuminated by screen glow in otherwise dark room, coffee cup nearby, papers scattered, work stress atmosphere, tight framing
Dutch angle, high contrast black and white, detective examining crime scene, dramatic lighting from single source, film noir aesthetic, venetian blind shadows on wall, gritty texture
couple arguing in kitchen
Extreme closeup macro shot of water droplet on leaf, morning dew, soft natural light, shallow DOF with creamy bokeh, nature photography style, peaceful and serene, maybe slight mist in background
Tracking shot following character running through crowded market, handheld camera feel, chaotic energy, people and vendors as obstacles, motivated by urgency, medium shot keeping pace with subject
sunset over ocean

symmetrical composition: person standing centered in grand architectural space, high ceilings, natural light from above, strong vertical lines, sense of scale and isolation, inspired by stanley kubrick framing

Bird's eye view straight down, someone lying in grass looking up at camera, flowers around them, dreamy afternoon sunlight filtering through trees, soft focus edges, peaceful moment, shot from drone or ladder
